post.body: I'm nothing compared to my mom. She bought two bloody hunks of cow and a whole bag full of cheese for Xmas dinner.
I WAS having a good day! Past tense!
Yes, that's exactly it. No, dumb ass, I'm talking about in Rudolph ><
Ok, but be prepared to hear all about Dr. Who. I always need to rant after the season finales.
*Hug* See?! Thank you for understanding that.
It took you that long to find it? Wow. I love that song xD But only that version. The other one has bad memories attached.
Three cups of coffee and a saved alien race later, my day is starting to get better again. Be thankful, foolish humans.
About to kick the coffee machine's big metallic head in. Why does it taunt me like this? My day is now ruined.
Today's a good day. Livvy can go to MSI, my favorite shirt is clean, and my kitty is being extremely cute. And cartoons!!!
Was up until 1 last night confusing myself with layers on Photoshop
Almost spit my hot chocolate out all over my laptop reading Ray's blog post. Love him. Also, Santa is an asshole.
Just got back from Xmas shopping. Broke and exhausted. Now mom's making me watch Rudolph with her.
I liked Dalek Kahn though. He (it?) was funny.
Cried over Dr. Who last night. I'm not even finding any relief in the whole Dalek genocide thing, because they're NEVER gone.
Okay. No more. I swear.
Wow, that's a lot of snow. I think I'll stay in bed today.
Still need to talk to people about the concert. Worst case scenario is me moshing by myself. Not too bad, honestly.
The world is really letting me down today. I didn't notice that the bread I was eating was moldy until I was halfway done with it.
And people who can't sing are now singing. What has this world come to?
Listening to people who can't play the guitar play the guitar.
